Introduction
This topic contains information on the types of services covered under 38 U.S.C. 1151, including
type of VA care considered under 38 U.S.C. 1151
definition of hospitalization under 38 CFR 3.358 vs. hospital care under 38 CFR 3.361
circumstances for VA care covered under 38 U.S.C. 1151
vocational rehabilitation services covered under 38 U.S.C. 1151
, and
CWT services covered under 38 U.S.C. 1151
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B
